metadata.synopsis: NPC Dialog during and after the Attack on Den state.

0.speaker: Tilses
0.text: Glad you're here with us. A bunch of ratty goblins aren't gonna send us running. We've been surviving long enough. Time to start living.

1.speaker: Tilses
1.text: Hope you won't miss this place. Don't think we'll be coming back any time soon.
1.context: NodeContext: A little relieved. A little bitter. Conflicted feelings.

2.speaker: Tilses
2.text: That's it. We can head to the city. Dunno about you, but I'm ready to start my life again.
2.context: NodeContext: A little relieved. A little bitter. Conflicted feelings.

3.speaker: Tilses
3.text: Good to see a familiar face. I have the strangest feeling every time you pass by. Like you're meant to be here.
